thread.title: 35 Percent Off Prepaid Car Rentals with Budget
thread.title_full: 35 Percent Off Prepaid Car Rentals with Budget

title: 35 Percent Off Prepaid Car Rentals with Budget
text:
35 Percent Off Prepaid Car Rentals with Budget 35 Percent Off Prepaid Car Rentals with Budget   5:45 PM Tweet 
Budget's ongoing Pay Now promotion offers discounts of up to 35 percent off online car-rental rates. You must prepay your rental, though you can alter your reservation at any time for free if your plans change. 
  To get the discount, visit the Pay Now promotional page on Budget's website. 
The fine print: You must prepay your rental, though you can alter your reservation at any time for free if your plans change. The promotion is only valid in the U.S. and Canada.
